name: Vourukasha's Glow
fourPiece: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG will be increased by 10%. After the equipping character takes DMG, the aforementioned DMG Bonus is increased by 80% for 5s. This effect increase can have 5 stacks. The duration of each stack is counted independently. These effects can be triggered even when the equipping character is not on the field.

goblet.name: Feast of Boundless Joy
goblet.description: An opulent wine goblet that was once filled with nectar and honeydew, but is empty today.

plume.name: Vibrant Pinion
plume.description: An exquisite feather-shaped decoration on which the vivid hues of verdant leaves and fragrant flowers shimmer.

circlet.name: Heart of Khvarena's Brilliance
circlet.description: Intricate and vibrant earrings upon which the luster of a hundred flowers seems to flow.

flower.name: Stamen of Khvarena's Origin
flower.description: An insignia in the shape of a lovely little flower that was once worn by pilgrims in times long bygone.

sands.name: Ancient Abscission
sands.description: An ancient timepiece upon which the light of Khvarena gleams. It is filled with a pure liquid that appears alive.

fourPc: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG will be increased by 10%. After the equipping character takes DMG, the aforementioned DMG Bonus is increased by 80% for 5s. This effect increase can have 5 stacks. The duration of each stack is counted independently. These effects can be triggered even when the equipping character is not on the field.
